content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Yumiko Tananka, a Japanese student, about working. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1

You will have a conversation with Yumiko Tananka, a Japanese student, about working. Press record to begin each response to the conversation. Response 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
